page.title: 14HAWARDEN AIRPORT
page.content: receive the same sort of commercial air traffic as, for instance, Liverpool airport. We do have visits from light aircraft, and managers from the various British Aerospace factories around the country quite often fly in aboard BAe. 125 business jets or BAe Doves. We also have a flying club based here, which is part of our Sports and Social Club, and members use the Chipmunks, Beagle Pups and Cassnas that the section owns. We no longer have a commercial air service making regular flights from the airfield. Our current employment rate is near the 4,000 mark. If you need any other help with your project please don't hesitate to contact me. Yours sincerely, Karen Roden. Public Relations
